result.eng: For a whole week, flights were grounded in the country with only occasional exceptions and, of course, hardly anybody even wanted to fly.

result.eng: A few years ago people were talking about the dawning of a new age for the media.

result.ga: níor ghá gur thomhaltóirí nuachta iad an lucht léitheoireachta nó éisteachta a thuilleadh ach táirgeoirí a bheadh in inmhe a gcuid tuairiscí féin a bhailiú

result.html: níor ghá gur thomhaltóirí nuachta iad an lucht léitheoireachta nó éisteachta a thuilleadh ach táirgeoirí a bheadh in inmhe a gcuid tuairiscí féin a bhailiúReaders and listeners did not have to be consumers of news anymore but producers who were able to collect their own reports.
result.ponchtml: níor ġá gur ṫoṁaltóirí nuaċta iad an luċt léiṫeoireaċta nó éisteaċta a ṫuilleaḋ aċ táirgeoirí a ḃeaḋ in inṁe a gcuid tuairiscí féin a ḃailiúReaders and listeners did not have to be consumers of news anymore but producers who were able to collect their own reports.

result.eng: They [ie. blogs] were dealing with a wide range of topics and giving opinions on everything under the sun.
result.ga: bhíodh raon fairsing ábhair faoi chaibidil iontu agus tuairimí á nochtadh faoi achan rud faoin spéir
result.orig: bhíodh raon fairsing ábhair faoi chaibidil iontu agus tuairimí á nochtadh faoi achan rud faoin spéir
result.html: bhíodh raon fairsing ábhair faoi chaibidil iontu agus tuairimí á nochtadh faoi achan rud faoin spéirThey [ie. blogs] were dealing with a wide range of topics and giving opinions on everything under the sun.
result.ponchtml: ḃíoḋ raon fairsing áḃair faoi ċaibidil iontu agus tuairimí á noċtaḋ faoi aċan rud faoin spéirThey [ie. blogs] were dealing with a wide range of topics and giving opinions on everything under the sun.

result.eng: Of course, some of them were as boring as watching blue mould growing on a piece of bread.
result.ga: ar ndóigh bhí cuid acu chomh leamh le bheith ag amharc ar mhúscán gorm ag fás ar phíosa aráin
result.orig: ar ndóigh bhí cuid acu chomh leamh le bheith ag amharc ar mhúscán gorm ag fás ar phíosa aráin
result.html: ar ndóigh bhí cuid acu chomh leamh le bheith ag amharc ar mhúscán gorm ag fás ar phíosa aráinOf course, some of them were as boring as watching blue mould growing on a piece of bread.
result.ponchtml: ar ndóiġ ḃí cuid acu ċoṁ leaṁ le ḃeiṫ ag aṁarc ar ṁúscán gorm ag fás ar ṗíosa aráinOf course, some of them were as boring as watching blue mould growing on a piece of bread.

result.eng: They were a considerable list once [ie. there were a lot of them].
result.ga: liosta le háireamh a bhí iontu tráth den saol
result.orig: liosta le háireamh a bhí iontu tráth den saol
result.html: liosta le háireamh a bhí iontu tráth den saolThey were a considerable list once [ie. there were a lot of them].
result.ponchtml: liosta le háireaṁ a ḃí iontu tráṫ den saolThey were a considerable list once [ie. there were a lot of them].

result.eng: The pupils were learning about the history of black people at school recently.
result.ga: bhí na daltaí ag foghlaim faoi stair an chine ghoirm le déanaí ar scoil
result.orig: bhí na daltaí ag foghlaim faoi stair an chine ghoirm le déanaí ar scoil
result.html: bhí na daltaí ag foghlaim faoi stair an chine ghoirm le déanaí ar scoilThe pupils were learning about the history of black people at school recently.
result.ponchtml: ḃí na daltaí ag foġlaim faoi stair an ċine ġoirm le déanaí ar scoilThe pupils were learning about the history of black people at school recently.

result.eng: Workers were needed to clear the land and to plant, harvest and carry the crops.
result.ga: bhí gá le hoibrithe chun an talamh a ghlanadh agus na bairr a chur a bhaint agus a iompar
result.orig: bhí gá le hoibrithe chun an talamh a ghlanadh agus na bairr a chur a bhaint agus a iompar
result.html: bhí gá le hoibrithe chun an talamh a ghlanadh agus na bairr a chur a bhaint agus a iomparWorkers were needed to clear the land and to plant, harvest and carry the crops.
result.ponchtml: ḃí gá le hoibriṫe ċun an talaṁ a ġlanaḋ agus na bairr a ċur a ḃaint agus a iomparWorkers were needed to clear the land and to plant, harvest and carry the crops.

result.eng: Of course, the traders were serving the sugar and clothes markets back in Europe.
result.ga: ar ndóigh ba ag freastal ar na margaí siúcra agus éadaí ar ais san eoraip a bhí na trádálaithe
result.orig: ar ndóigh ba ag freastal ar na margaí siúcra agus éadaí ar ais san eoraip a bhí na trádálaithe
result.html: ar ndóigh ba ag freastal ar na margaí siúcra agus éadaí ar ais san eoraip a bhí na trádálaitheOf course, the traders were serving the sugar and clothes markets back in Europe.
result.ponchtml: ar ndóiġ ba ag freastal ar na margaí siúcra agus éadaí ar ais san eoraip a ḃí na trádálaiṫeOf course, the traders were serving the sugar and clothes markets back in Europe.

result.eng: But competition between the suppliers was fierce and the profits were narrow.
result.ga: ach bhí an comórtas géar idir na soláthróirí agus bhí na brabaigh caol
result.orig: ach bhí an comórtas géar idir na soláthróirí agus bhí na brabaigh caol
result.html: ach bhí an comórtas géar idir na soláthróirí agus bhí na brabaigh caolBut competition between the suppliers was fierce and the profits were narrow.
result.ponchtml: aċ ḃí an comórtas géar idir na soláṫróirí agus ḃí na brabaiġ caolBut competition between the suppliers was fierce and the profits were narrow.

result.eng: Estate owners were not able to attract workers from Europe to America.
result.ga: ní raibh úinéirí na n-eastát in ann oibrithe a mhealladh as an eoraip ná as meiriceá
result.orig: ní raibh úinéirí na n-eastát in ann oibrithe a mhealladh as an eoraip ná as meiriceá
result.html: ní raibh úinéirí na n-eastát in ann oibrithe a mhealladh as an eoraip ná as meiriceáEstate owners were not able to attract workers from Europe to America.
result.ponchtml: ní raiḃ úinéirí na n-eastát in ann oibriṫe a ṁeallaḋ as an eoraip ná as meiriceáEstate owners were not able to attract workers from Europe to America.

result.eng: From this time onward, most black people seen in Europe and the new world were slaves.
result.ga: as an am seo amach b'iad sclábhaithe formhór mór na ndaoine gorma a facthas san eoraip agus sa domhan nua
result.orig: as an am seo amach b'iad sclábhaithe formhór mór na ndaoine gorma a facthas san eoraip agus sa domhan nua
result.html: as an am seo amach b'iad sclábhaithe formhór mór na ndaoine gorma a facthas san eoraip agus sa domhan nuaFrom this time onward, most black people seen in Europe and the new world were slaves.
result.ponchtml: as an am seo amaċ b'iad scláḃaiṫe forṁór mór na ndaoine gorma a facṫas san eoraip agus sa doṁan nuaFrom this time onward, most black people seen in Europe and the new world were slaves.

result.eng: Jamie was left among a pack of other children who were about his own size.
result.ga: fágadh séimí i gcuideachta scaifte eile páistí a bhí fána thuairim féin méide
result.orig: fágadh séimí i gcuideachta scaifte eile páistí a bhí fána thuairim féin méide
result.html: fágadh séimí i gcuideachta scaifte eile páistí a bhí fána thuairim féin méideJamie was left among a pack of other children who were about his own size.
result.ponchtml: fágaḋ séimí i gcuideaċta scaifte eile páistí a ḃí fána ṫuairim féin méideJamie was left among a pack of other children who were about his own size.

result.eng: The children went to bed but were not sleepy.
result.ga: chuaigh na páistí a luí ach ní raibh fonn codlata orthu
result.orig: chuaigh na páistí a luí ach ní raibh fonn codlata orthu
result.html: chuaigh na páistí a luí ach ní raibh fonn codlata orthuThe children went to bed but were not sleepy.
result.ponchtml: ċuaiġ na páistí a luí aċ ní raiḃ fonn codlata orṫuThe children went to bed but were not sleepy.

result.eng: Jamie's eyes were closing.
result.ga: bhí na súile ag drud ar shéimí
result.orig: bhí na súile ag drud ar shéimí
result.html: bhí na súile ag drud ar shéimíJamie's eyes were closing.
result.ponchtml: ḃí na súile ag drud ar ẛéimíJamie's eyes were closing.

result.eng: Will the sun be much bigger when we're beside it?
result.ga: an mbeidh an ghrian mórán níos mó nuair a bheimid ag a taobh
result.orig: an mbeidh an ghrian mórán níos mó nuair a bheimid ag a taobh
result.html: an mbeidh an ghrian mórán níos mó nuair a bheimid ag a taobhWill the sun be much bigger when we're beside it?
result.ponchtml: an mbeiḋ an ġrian mórán níos mó nuair a ḃeimid ag a taoḃWill the sun be much bigger when we're beside it?

result.eng: Three women were wading through the snow.
result.ga: bhí triúr ban ag spágáil leo fríd an tsneachta
result.orig: bhí triúr ban ag spágáil leo fríd an tsneachta
result.html: bhí triúr ban ag spágáil leo fríd an tsneachtaThree women were wading through the snow.
result.ponchtml: ḃí triúr ban ag spágáil leo fríd an tsneaċtaThree women were wading through the snow.

result.eng: They were waiting for their turn.
result.ga: bhí siad ag feitheamh lena seal
result.orig: bhí siad ag feitheamh lena seal
result.html: bhí siad ag feitheamh lena sealThey were waiting for their turn.
result.ponchtml: ḃí siad ag feiṫeaṁ lena sealThey were waiting for their turn.

result.eng: Why did you want to talk to me? Why were you looking for me?
result.ga: cad chuige a raibh tú domh
result.orig: cad chuige a raibh tú domh
result.html: cad chuige a raibh tú domhWhy did you want to talk to me? Why were you looking for me?
result.ponchtml: cad ċuige a raiḃ tú doṁWhy did you want to talk to me? Why were you looking for me?

result.eng: He eyes were closing with sleep.
result.ga: bhí na súile ag drud uirthi leis an chodladh
result.orig: bhí na súile ag drud uirthi leis an chodladh
result.html: bhí na súile ag drud uirthi leis an chodladhHe eyes were closing with sleep.
result.ponchtml: ḃí na súile ag drud uirṫi leis an ċodlaḋHe eyes were closing with sleep.

result.eng: Her eyes were red from how much she had been crying.
result.ga: bhí a dhá shúil dearg ar mhéad is a bhí caointe aici
result.orig: bhí a dhá shúil dearg ar mhéad is a bhí caointe aici
result.html: bhí a dhá shúil dearg ar mhéad is a bhí caointe aiciHer eyes were red from how much she had been crying.
result.ponchtml: ḃí a ḋá ẛúil dearg ar ṁéad is a ḃí caointe aiciHer eyes were red from how much she had been crying.

result.eng: They were walking quietly and tiredly. But not Jamie: he was young, fit and quick.
result.ga: bhí siad ag siúl leo go brúite tostach níorbh é sin do shéimí é bhí sé óg lúfar gasta
result.orig: bhí siad ag siúl leo go brúite tostach níorbh é sin do shéimí é bhí sé óg lúfar gasta
result.html: bhí siad ag siúl leo go brúite tostach níorbh é sin do shéimí é bhí sé óg lúfar gastaThey were walking quietly and tiredly. But not Jamie: he was young, fit and quick.
result.ponchtml: ḃí siad ag siúl leo go brúite tostaċ níorḃ é sin do ẛéimí é ḃí sé óg lúfar gastaThey were walking quietly and tiredly. But not Jamie: he was young, fit and quick.

result.eng: His teeth were chattering from cold.
result.ga: bhí a chár á ghreadadh ar a chéile le fuacht
result.orig: bhí a chár á ghreadadh ar a chéile le fuacht
result.html: bhí a chár á ghreadadh ar a chéile le fuachtHis teeth were chattering from cold.
result.ponchtml: ḃí a ċár á ġreadaḋ ar a ċéile le fuaċtHis teeth were chattering from cold.

result.eng: You were right, grandma.
result.ga: a mháthair mhór is tú a chan an fhírinne
result.orig: a mháthair mhór is tú a chan an fhírinne
result.html: a mháthair mhór is tú a chan an fhírinneYou were right, grandma.
result.ponchtml: a ṁáṫair ṁór is tú a ċan an ḟírinneYou were right, grandma.

result.eng: The streets we emptying and the lights were going out.
result.ga: bhí na sráideanna ag bánú agus na solais ag gabháil as
result.orig: bhí na sráideanna ag bánú agus na solais ag gabháil as
result.html: bhí na sráideanna ag bánú agus na solais ag gabháil asThe streets we emptying and the lights were going out.
result.ponchtml: ḃí na sráideanna ag bánú agus na solais ag gaḃáil asThe streets we emptying and the lights were going out.

result.eng: They were a day's walk from the place.
result.ga: bhí siad fá shiúl lae don áit
result.orig: bhí siad fá shiúl lae don áit
result.html: bhí siad fá shiúl lae don áitThey were a day's walk from the place.
result.ponchtml: ḃí siad fá ẛiúl lae don áitThey were a day's walk from the place.

result.eng: His pockets were bursting with gold.
result.ga: bhí a phócaí ag brúchtaigh leis an ór
result.orig: bhí a phócaí ag brúchtaigh leis an ór
result.html: bhí a phócaí ag brúchtaigh leis an órHis pockets were bursting with gold.
result.ponchtml: ḃí a ṗócaí ag brúċtaiġ leis an órHis pockets were bursting with gold.
